alert.note: Alert for Lafayette; Marshall; Panola (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 2:24PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Lafayette, southwestern Marshall and northeastern Panola Counties through 245 PM CDT... At 224 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near John W Kyle State Park, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Oxford, Cambridge, Harmontown, Laws Hill, Abbeville, Malone, Keel, Blackwater, Teckville, Glenville, College Hill Station, College Hill, Hayes Crossing and Spraggins. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
